subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Russia won its fourth Fed Cup in five years , defeating Spain when Svetlana Kuznetsova beat Anabel Medina Garrigues, 5-7, 6-3, 6-4, to clinch the title in Madrid.
snippet: Russia won its fourth Fed Cup in five years , defeating Spain when Svetlana Kuznetsova beat Anabel Medina Garrigues, 5-7, 6-3, 6-4, to clinch the title in Madrid.
